cosmic_conquistadors

Class Utility

  • java.lang.Object
    • cosmic_conquistadors.Utility

  • public final class Utility
extends java.lang.Object
    The Utility class provides utility methods which can be useful anywhere in the game.

    • Method Detail

      • isInDebugMode

        public static boolean isInDebugMode()
        Checks whether the game is run in debug mode
        Returns:
        true if the game was started in debug mode, else false

      • debugPrintLine

        public static void debugPrintLine(java.lang.String message)
        Prints the message only if debug mode is enabled (isInDebugMode returns true)
        Parameters:
        message - the message to print to standard out

      • normalize

        public static double normalize(double value,
                               double min,
                               double max)
                        throws java.lang.ArithmeticException
        "Normalizes" the double value in a range between min-max to a value between 0-1. value is linearly scaled to be the same distance from 0 as it is to min and the same distance from 1 as it is from max.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to normalize
        min - the minimum value in the range of values
        max - the maximum value in the range of values
        Returns:
        the normalized value
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArithmeticException

      • normalize

        public static double normalize(int value,
                               int min,
                               int max)
                        throws java.lang.ArithmeticException
        "Normalizes" the int value in a range between min-max to a value between 0-1. value is linearly scaled to be the same distance from 0 as it is to min and the same distance from 1 as it is from max.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to normalize
        min - the minimum value in the range of values
        max - the maximum value in the range of values
        Returns:
        the normalized value
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArithmeticException

      • normalize

        public static double normalize(long value,
                               long min,
                               long max)
                        throws java.lang.ArithmeticException
        "Normalizes" the long value in a range between min-max to a value between 0-1. value is linearly scaled to be the same distance from 0 as it is to min and the same distance from 1 as it is from max.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to normalize
        min - the minimum value in the range
        max - the maximum value in the range
        Returns:
        the normalized value
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArithmeticException

      • clamp

        public static double clamp(double value,
                           double lower,
                           double upper)
                    throws java.lang.ArithmeticException
        Clamps the long value to the bounds lower and lower. If value is greater than upper then upper is returned else if value is smaller than lower then lower is returned else value is returned as is.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to clamp
        lower - the minimum value of the bounds
        upper - the maximum value of the bounds
        Returns:
        the clamped value
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArithmeticException

      • clamp

        public static int clamp(int value,
                        int lower,
                        int upper)
        Clamps the int value to the bounds lower and lower. If value is greater than upper then upper is returned else if value is smaller than lower then lower is returned else value is returned as is.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to clamp
        lower - the minimum value of the bounds
        upper - the maximum value of the bounds
        Returns:
        the clamped value

      • clamp

        public static long clamp(long value,
                         long lower,
                         long upper)
        Clamps the long value to the bounds lower and lower. If value is greater than upper then upper is returned else if value is smaller than lower then lower is returned else value is returned unchanged.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to clamp
        lower - the minimum value of the bounds
        upper - the maximum value of the bounds
        Returns:
        the clamped value

      • getKeyCode

        public static int getKeyCode(java.lang.String key)
        Attempts to get a KeyCode from a given String
        Parameters:
        key - the key to parse. Special characters should be enclosed in square brackets ([])
        Returns:
        the corrosponsing KeyCode if key was successfully parsed, else 0
